channel.title: Adding working Portals (Client+Source Pk Planet, 317)
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i752.photobucket.com/albums/xx164/vassilistein/Heythere.jpg[/img] I use Pk Planet 317 Sources and Client for my RSPS. I wanna change place where i get by clicking on portal. Looks like this in my Source->sources->client.java->makeglobalobjects editing:
makeGlobalObject(3087, 3483, 7272, 1, 10);
This is the portal i want to change: [IMG]http://i752.photobucket.com/albums/xx164/vassilistein/0062.png[/img] Thanks, Sale
